snippet.title: FlameKeeper - trailer
snippet.description:
After many hours of work at night, our little work finally comes out into the daylight. Here is the trailer of the game we are working on, half a minute of pure joy, we hope you will enjoy at least as much fun as we do. Although to be honest we already have darkness in front of our eyes.
Big cheers for Zevik, awesome music and sfx mate!
 #madewithunity #indiegamedev

Zevik - http://zevikperry.com/
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Steam Wishlist - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1374230/Flame_Keeper/?beta=0
----------------------------------------------------------------------
MindInMess - https://www.mindinmess.com/
